statements: UPDATE ChatbotFAQ SET answer_text = 'Updated answer for question 1' WHERE question_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE ChatbotFAQ SET question_text = 'How do I reset my password?', answer_text = 'To reset your password, go to the login page and click on the 'Forgot Password' link.' WHERE question_id = '2b38a6d6-8b15-4f53-a084-2a9c9424b9b9';

UPDATE ChatbotFAQ SET question_text = 'What are the system requirements for the chatbot?', answer_text = 'The chatbot requires a modern web browser with JavaScript enabled.' WHERE question_id = '12d7abf9-6c21-4377-94b9-841a75e61cf1';
UPDATE chatbot_messages SET response_text = 'Thank you for your query' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_queries SET answered = true WHERE query_id = 5;
UPDATE chatbot_messages SET response_text = 'Thank you for reaching out!' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_queries SET answered = TRUE, query_text = 'Your query has been resolved' WHERE query_id = 5;
UPDATE User SET name='Alice' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Message SET message_text='Hello, how are you?' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE User SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Message SET message_text = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2;
UPDATE chatbot_users SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='1234567890' WHERE user_id=1;
